text: Nza guigira Krais khothɨgap, ana tɨvar vhuun nzan muun zav, nza ana rarga wari ki. Nza maaŋ muuŋgip, kha nuiana bigi ndir saŋv ntara suaŋv, guigira Krais khothɨgɨp anan rargɨp kɨrga, nza guigira fhɨreregi. Mba nuiana gumgi mbari, mbe vhɨra sagi tari ma. Nza mbe kambarav, nza guigira sagi tari guarira kɨrga.
